short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will can scroll to top of page, to bottom or to stored positions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is best extension for smart page scrolling.

Main features:

- free
- simple
- scroll to top of page
- scroll to bottom of page
- return (scroll to stored points)
- drag on window
- off-on switcher
- custom position of controls
- custom interface

Enjoy!
